abilities.name: Barkskin.
abilities.description: Sharwyn's AC can't be lower than 16.

abilities.name: Special Equipment.
abilities.description: Sharwyn has a spell book that contains the spells listed in her Spellcasting trait, plus detect magic and silent image.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Sharwyn is a 1st-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, prestidigitation, ray of frost
1st level (2 slots): color spray, magic missile, shield, sleep.

abilities.name: Tree Thrall.
abilities.description: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sharwyn dies 24 hours later.
